name: What If? (FishyGames🐟)
description:
It is 2020, the year of chaos? What if, we could change the past, what if, all this never happened? In this story-based game where choices matter, you get to redecide the past events and choices. From wildfires to the virus outbreak, to the riots on the streets. Your choices MATTER. Well, at least if the outcome was not fixed. Haven't I mentioned this? You cannot change the future. (Unless you find the special items that aid you but we don't talk about that)

What if, we look at 2020 from a different perspective?

Please enter fullscreen mode for a better experience. 

Enjoy!

Made for the Game Jam AD 2020  in 2 weeks - Theme: 2020

Version 1.2
